info.title: Tasking API
info.description:
Interface for the satellite tasking flow, including the feasibility endpoint collection,
tasking ordering, retrieving and listing order information, as well as retrieving ordered tasking data.

get.description:
Returns a list of your tasking orders. The orders are returned sorted by creation
date, with the most recent orders appearing first.

parameters.name: per_page

schema.description: The number of orders to return per page.
schema.title: Per Page

parameters.description: The number of orders to return per page.

402.description: Insufficient credit available to make a reservation

403.description: Breach of contract terms and conditions / Reseller end user error

get.description: Retrieves the tasking order with a given ID.

Download the item for a specified tasking order owned by the authenticated user,
provided the order has been fulfilled.

By default, the redirect parameter is set to True which allows the image
content to be downloaded locally. If the redirect parameter is False, a
presigned download URL with an expiry will be returned.

parameters.name: redirect

schema.description: If `true` download the image content locally, otherwise if `false` return a presigned download URL with an expiry. Defaults to `true`.
schema.title: Redirect

parameters.description: If `true` download the image content locally, otherwise if `false` return a presigned download URL with an expiry. Defaults to `true`.

get.summary: Retrieve acquisition details for a tasking order.
get.description: Returns acquisition details for a tasking order.

post.description: Searches feasibility options for a tasking order.

403.description: Breach of contract terms and conditions.

get.summary: List all feasibility requests owned by a user.
get.description: Retrieves all tasking feasibility requests owned by a user.

parameters.name: per_page

schema.description: The number of orders to return per page
schema.title: Per Page

parameters.description: The number of orders to return per page

get.description: Retrieves the tasking feasibility request with a given ID.

get.summary: Retrieve response for a feasibility request
get.description:
Retrieves the tasking feasibility response with a given request ID. Passes are returned
in ascending order based on the start of the estimated acquisition time.

post.summary: Get price for a set of ordering parameters.
post.description: Returns the price for a set of ordering parameters.

403.description: Breach of contract terms and conditions.

post.description: Search for feasibility requests/responses and tasking orders owned by the user.

properties.description: Allowed properties to filter a search. Filterable string fields allow one value or a list of values resulting in an equality or 'IN' comparison respectively. For numeric fields, one value similarly achieves an equality operation. A tuple of 2 values can also be provided to search inclusively between a range.

intersects.title: Intersects
intersects.description: A GeoJSON geometry to filter for. Items are returned if the geometry of theitem intersects with the geometry provided.

sort_by.title: Sort By
sort_by.description: Sort the order in which results are returned.

features.title: Features

value.title: Value
value.description: Price of the order in minor units of the currency e.g. pence, cents.

base.title: Base
base.description: The base price of the order in minor units of the currency e.g. pence, cents.

addon:withhold.title: Addon:Withhold
addon:withhold.description: The price of the order from the chosen withhold option in minor units of the currency e.g. pence, cents.

total.title: Total
total.description: The total price of the order in minor units of the currency e.g. pence, cents. This is the sum of the base and addon prices.

value.title: Value
value.description: Price of the order in minor units of the currency e.g. pence, cents.
